TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InsertItemPosition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the location of the template when it is rendered as part of the control.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control that is configured to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template as the last item in the control.
> [!IMPORTANT] > This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#2)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#2)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition FirstItem = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The template is rendered as the first item in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition LastItem = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The template is rendered as the last item in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition None = int32(0)
